Life is a Pot of Beans

Emmanuel

â€œThis life na oneâ€¦ but if you do am well, one go doâ€

Recent happenings have made me think a lot more about the meaning of life. To understand things we can use metaphors to simplify them which is good for communicating complex ideas in simple relatable terms, like beans. By comparing life to a pot of beans I stuff all the complexity and vicissitudes of life into a single phrase. It just makes me understand it better. â€œLife is a pot of beansâ€. Thatâ€™s been my response to things lately.

I heard it for the first time one evening in Volpi Boys after talking about the dayâ€™s Twitter trends and some Kanye west shit (idk man), Akanimoh paused and in a philosophic tone said â€œLife is a pot of beansâ€ and it stuck on me immediately. Life really is a pot of beans. Now allow me to flog this metaphor :)

Life comes with different things

â€œIf you donâ€™t eat yam for the sake of palm oil, youâ€™ll eat palm oil for the sake yamâ€

Do you like beans? In my secondary school it was considered razz to like beans but I loved it partly because it was sweet, like sugar sweet. Anyway, we ate it every Wednesday and though many felt it razz (because peer pressure) everyone came to the dining hall on Wednesdays. Why? Because some wanted just the fish, some preferred just the dodo, you sha came for either the beans, the fish, or the plantain.

That is how Life is complete with different people and experiences. It would be premature to think that you will always feel the way you feel now, or that you will always like the things you like or that you wonâ€™t meet more interesting people in the future. Life just has too much to offer so the propensity for change is enormousâ€¦ There are a lot of stupid people, a lot of funny people, dry guys, basic babes, good times and not so good times, itâ€™s just part of it. The life you choose will come with different things so just take it like that.

Life can be anything you want

â€œAnyone can be a Golden Boy, na lifestyleâ€

Beans is versatile and variable. You can make any kind of beans itâ€™s up to you same way Life can be both satisfying and excruciating, itâ€™s part of it. You can be almost anything you want these days you just have to, first of all, aspire for it then move towards it. Your life can be exciting or boring as hell, itâ€™s not always up to us but most of the time it is.

Do something different with your hair for example see how that goes. Then next week give yourself a mad nickname and demand everyone call you that for the entire week. For this week Iâ€™ve chosen Oba of Niggatown.

Life has good and bad parts

â€œItâ€™s part of itâ€

Like beans, your life will have the good and bad, itâ€™s part of it. There will be stones, weevils, uncooked beans, and that Maggi that refused to melt. If right now you are eating the bad parts, keep chewing it gets better. Because you chewed on some raw pepper doesnâ€™t mean the whole food is bad nau, thatâ€™s just part of it. Be like â€œOmo raw pepper. But also, Oshey fishâ€.

Life takes time

â€œBest time to start cooking beans is yesterdayâ€

Unless your intention is to give yourself explosive diarrhea you have to cook your beans for some time. Donâ€™t disregard the process of cooking, even if you are using a pressure pot itâ€™s not like Indomie. So relax. Start cooking, just be cooking, just be cooking. Hopefully, everything will come together so long as you keep cooking. In the same vien, Life takes time but also goes by really fast. â€œDay to day it will seem like nothing has changed but when you look bak you will realize, everything changed.â€

Life is unpredictable

â€œ2 seconds everywhere burstâ€

Maybe when you were picking your beans you imagined by now it wonâ€™t be like this. You wanted the onions to still be showing but they have disappeared. It dey happen. Things just happen, look at this year whowouldathought it will be like this. We all have good ideas for how our lives should turn out but sometimes they donâ€™t happen exactly the way we plan. There are things outside our locus of control, donâ€™t try to control them because you canâ€™t. you dey mad?

You canâ€™t determine exactly how your beans will come out, all you can do is put in the ingredients and turn on the stove. Take care of things that are within your control so that at the end of the day you can confidently say â€œit is what it isâ€ knowing you did everything you could.

Lives are not the same

â€œEveryone get their own wayâ€

Everyone cooks their beans differently, some cook it chunky, some cook it watery, some cook it burnt. There is no â€œbetterâ€ beans, just beans. If you eat yours with apple slices and cinnamon more power to you brutha. If you just prefer classic plain Oloyi beans, thatâ€™s okay too as long as that is what you want. This doesnâ€™t mean that there arenâ€™t general principles that you should follow; you donâ€™t cook beans in a microwave, only cultists do that. But details like whether to put all the ingredients in the beginning or gradually donâ€™t really matter. Na still beans we dey cook. Thatâ€™s how lives are different.

Let your life serve your purposes if not you will despise living. If your neighbor wants to lose weight they will add ingredients that help them achieve that goal, which doesnâ€™t make theirs better than yours just makes it different. The things you add to your life are to help you become the ideal version of yourself. So donâ€™t look into other peopleâ€™s pots, they are cooking the beans that best serves their purpose.
